creator: Marble Apps
descriptionHtml:
This credit card payoff calculator will let you see how many months it will take to pay off your credit card balance with your current monthly repayment. See how long it is before you are debt free and stress free from any credit card debt.

CREDIT CARD DEBT CALCULATOR
If you have multiple credit cards and are looking at which credit card debt to pay off first. Then you need to see what is the total interest you will be paying so you can figure out which credit card to pay off. This app allows you to either enter your payoff goal in months or years or you can choose to enter the monthly payment you can afford to pay and see how many months it will take to pay off the balance.

CREDIT CARD REPAYMENTS
Making consistent monthly payments is a sure way to reduce your interest payments over time and pay off your debt quicker. You can see a credit card amortization schedule that shows your balance for each month, interest you paid and principal payment. That way you can instantly see how changing your repayments will affect your amortization over time. The amortization schedule is great for accounting purposes when you are doing your yearly budget and want to consolidate your debts.

CREDIT CARD CALCULATOR
This is a simple app where by entering a few details you can get detailed information about your credit card debt. Like how much interest you will have to pay, the total cost of the debt, overpayment and how long it will take to pay off. You may be looking into your budget and need to know if you should pay off credit card or car loan first then use this app to calculate the total interest for your debt.

CREDIT CARD INTEREST CALCULATOR
If you are switching credit card companies you can use this app to see if you are getting a better deal with a lower APR and check what your monthly payment will be. This credit card interest calculator will let you calculate the total interest for your credit card balance in seconds. Enter the fixed amount you will pay monthly or payoff goal and the credit card monthly payment calculator will find out your monthly repayments so you can see when you will be debt free.

CREDIT CARD PAYOFF FEATURES
✔️ Enter the interest rate (APR) and remaining credit card debt
✔️ Put in a payoff goal for when you would like to be debt free
✔️ Monthly amortization schedule for your debt
✔️ You can choose to enter a payoff goal or fixed monthly repayment
✔️ Download for FREE today
descriptionShort: Calculate your monthly payment to payoff credit card interest and debt

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes for Credit Card Interest Calculator
